channel.title: Our Works on Pantrypoints
channel.description: Recent content in Our Works on Pantrypoints

item.title: Phoenix-based Web Apps and APIs
item.description: We make web apps and APIs using Elixir-Phoenix and LiveView Link Description Date https://capricafe.pantrypoints.com A loyalty system 2022 https://hub.pantrypoints.com A moneyless economic system 2020

item.title: Boooks and E-books
item.description: We design and proofread books, and publish ebooks on Google Play and Amazon Link Description The Treatise of Human Nature Simplified The Simplified Works of David Hume The Wealth of Nations Simplified The Simplified Works of Adam Smith Towards Maharlika A book advocating systemic change in the Philippines The Republic Simplified The dialogues by Socrates in a modern chat format

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: We do machine learning for our own research. Link Description Date Behavioral Prediction System (BPS) A prediction system for criminology, insurance, etc Oct 17, 2022 ISAIAH A matching system that uses BPS for Pantry April 11, 2022 Predict A prediction chat app for political and economic events Coming soon!

item.title: Research
item.description: We do research on Superphysics as an upgrade to science by adding metaphysics, feeling-patterns, and data science to it Link Description Superphysics A new science based on Socrates and David Hume that puts science on a proper metaphysical base Material Superphysics The dynamics of the abstract mind of the universe Medical Superphysics The dynamics of disease and health based on the abstract mind Social Superphysics The dynamics of the abstract mind of society Theory Description Universal Relativity An alternative to general relativity that uses the aether instead of light E = Gl Our equation for everything, based on the 5 layers of Superphysics Qosts Our equation for everything, based on the 5 layers of Superphysics

item.title: Flutter-based Mobile Apps
item.description: We use Flutter to develop mobile apps for Android and iOS. Link Description Date Diet-Disease App A Disease reference app 2023 Circle A moneyless ecommerce app 2023

item.title: Social Systems
item.description: We create new social systems based on our research. Link Description Date Pantrypoints Circle A Circular Economy System 2023

item.title: SEO for Websites
item.description: We optimize content for Search Engines Link Description Date superphysics.org A Science Website July 26, 2021

item.title: Rails-based Web Apps and API
item.description: We make web apps and APIs using Ruby on Rails with Action Cable. Link Description Date SORA An economic social network 2016
